page.title: 02CLUBS IN CHAGFORD
page.content: Chagford has 2{Youth clubs},1 is for the{under 12's}and the other for the {over 12's.}The younger club is held on Friday nights,and the elder club is held on Wednesday nights.The younger club is from{6}pm to{9}pm,and,the older youth club from{7}pm to{10}pm. Both clubs are held in the{Youth Wing} of the Adult Education Centre. There are also{camera}club,{pottery} club and{woodwork}club.These are held in the{Adult Education Centre}too, and for adults only. The{Lions}club is a men's club whose main interest is raising money for charities.They organise sponsered {walks,go-kart}races and{barbecues}etc. There is a{Judo}club which meets most{ {Wednesday}nights,during term time,in the{Globe Hotel.} In 1981 the Chagford Appraisal listed{70 Clubs}in existence in this area.
